attributes.action: Parliament must uphold its decision not leave the EU without a deal.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament agreed not to leave without EU without a deal. 

Parliament has not secured a deal. 

Time to make a deal has expired. 

Remain in the EU commands greater public majority than all other Brexit options which have no clear consensus.
attributes.background: Parliament agreed not to leave the EU without a deal.  Parliament have failed to reach a deal.  It is petitioned that Parliament uphold this decision and not leave the EU as no deal was reached.
